name: Micronaut
description:
MICRONAUT

A Qi Learning Academy game, made in Unity 3D to enable education and understanding of the ocean environment.

Project lead: Trish Stone, Qualcomm Institute

Advisor: Jules Jaffe, SCRIPPS

Students: Jasmine Guerrero and Shiv Sakthivel, UCSD

Sound recording: Aaron Thode, SCRIPPS

Modeling and Animation: Thomas Circle, PoNG

Support provided by Qualcomm Institute Learning Academy and PoNG Center
